Greetings from Vancouver Island. After 46 years as a small town lawyer, I am now retired. I have lived in Qualicum Beach on the east coast of Vancouver Island, British Columbia for more than 40 years. The avatar is my great great grandfather James Charles William Walker (b. Glasgow 1820, d. South Tilley NB 1889)

Welcome to the Newsmast Technology Community Feed. A curated feed of posts from the Fediverse, handmade by @newsmast@newmast.social, and broadcasting to Bluesky (if you've opted-in via @brid.gy.ap)!

To post to the community just add #technology to your post. You can create a list to follow this account, and exclude the posts from your home timeline.

note: Rick Dearman (1964 - ) is a prolific author who has written extensively across multiple genres. Born in Newark, Ohio, Rick spent 10 years in the USAF before relocating to Britain, where he currently resides in Chelmsford with his partner and beloved dog. With a passion for storytelling and an imaginative mind, Rick has created captivating works in the realms of fantasy, action, and more.
